name: Hacking Simulator (RUBYisHERE)
description:
< CONTROLS >

LeftMouseButton - Pick Up Item

RightMouseButton - Place Item

SpaceBar - Drop Item

< ABOUT >

You were reached out by a secret organization dedicated to hacking technologies around the world after seeing your performance in changing your grades at school. Your job is solving puzzles, completing code scripts and make yourself a happy person~

Hacking Simulator is a game where you simulate hacking other devices, networks and maybe technological weapons. This is a fictional game with some real life reference mainly in the coding.
